channel.title: math.GM updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.GM updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Sums of Powers of Sine and Generalized Bernoulli Polynomials
item.description: arXiv:2502.15966v4 Announce Type: replace Abstract: We produce formulas for $$\sum_{j=1}^{2^{n-2}}\frac{1}{\sin^s\left(\frac{(2j-1)\pi}{2^n}\right)}$$ in terms of Generalized Bernoulli and Euler polynomials and use one of the formulas to produce a nice integral representation of the Riemann zeta function.
item.dc:creator: Leon D. Fairbanks

item.title: Well-posed Self-Similarity in Incompressible Standard Flows
item.description: arXiv:2504.21000v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: This article reviews the properties of the self-similar solutions of the Navier-Stokes equation for incompressible fluids. Since any smooth solution can be embedded into a self-similar solution at the identity scale, it follows that under standard flow conditions, the initial solution will remain smooth for all time as long as the self-similar solution is selected to have certain isobaric weight.
item.dc:creator: J. Polihronov
